name: property-read-write-codelens
description: Displays CodeLens read/write counts for class properties in JavaScript and TypeScript

propertyReadWriteCodelens.readEmoji.description: Emoji to use for read references in CodeLens.

propertyReadWriteCodelens.writeEmoji.description: Emoji to use for write references in CodeLens.

propertyReadWriteCodelens.readAffix.description: Text/affix to display after the read count (e.g. 'reads', 'lectures', 'Ë™≠„ÅøÂèñ„Çä').

propertyReadWriteCodelens.writeAffix.description: Text/affix to display after the write count (e.g. 'writes', '√©critures', 'Êõ∏„ÅçËæº„Åø').

propertyReadWriteCodelens.showReads.description: Enable display of read references in CodeLens.

propertyReadWriteCodelens.showWrites.description: Enable display of write references in CodeLens.
